BackstoryDef.title: farm kitten
BackstoryDef.description: It was no secret that [PAWN_nameDef] loved milk. Whenever [PAWN_possessive] parents were milking the cattle, [PAWN_pronoun] drifted over immediately, bouncing on [PAWN_possessive] heels in excitement. Afterward, [PAWN_pronoun] would sit on an old wooden stool, sipping a fresh cup while watching dust motes dance in the barn’s warm light. Most days ended with [PAWN_nameDef] napping on a hay bale, smelling faintly of grass and sunshine.

BackstoryDef.description: Despite [PAWN_possessive] parents’ best efforts, the frontier colony was simply too harsh a place for [PAWN_nameDef] to enjoy a peaceful childhood. From a young age, [PAWN_pronoun] learned how to handle a gun and tend to the wounds of [PAWN_possessive] neighbors.

BackstoryDef.description: After losing [PAWN_possessive] parents in a particularly vicious pirate raid, [PAWN_nameDef] found the very thought of shooting someone unbearable. Haunted by that day, [PAWN_pronoun] turned away from guns and instead learned to keep others alive, tutoring under a seasoned mercenary medic and picking up whatever skills [PAWN_pronoun] could to patch people back together.

BackstoryDef.title: shy kitten
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in the nightless megabuildings of a hubworld. City life was always crowded yet lonely, but [PAWN_pronoun] managed to keep [PAWN_possessive] small circle of friends together.\n\nThey were a quiet little group—shy kids who ate lunch on the same stairwell every day and shared whispered jokes between classes. Even in a city packed with billions, they stuck close, walking home together through the streets that never truly went dark.

BackstoryDef.description: Eager to help [PAWN_pronoun] parents’ small shop, [PAWN_nameDef] greeted customers and talked about the wares—even if it mostly came out as childlike rambles. Somehow, that only made customers like [PAWN_objective] more.

BackstoryDef.title: laid-back kitten
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] never saw the point of rushing or stressing over minor inconveniences. Things always sorted themselves out eventually…well, usually. [PAWN_pronoun] preferred taking long naps in the local park, sunbathing with a bag of chips resting in [PAWN_possessive] hands.

BackstoryDef.title: collecter kitten
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] liked shiny things—pebbles, coins, or a “totally not stolen” medal of honor that [PAWN_possessive] cousin had accidentally dropped from their uniform and then spent weeks searching for. [PAWN_pronoun] kept these treasures hidden away in an old shoebox—right up until [PAWN_pronoun] proudly showed the medal to that same cousin by mistake.

BackstoryDef.title: explorer kitten
BackstoryDef.description: Marching through the plains with a slingshot in one hand and a magnifying glass in the other, [PAWN_nameDef] spent hours chasing shiny beetles or digging up anthills. Whenever [PAWN_pronoun] got hungry, [PAWN_pronoun] simply ate wild berries and kept exploring.

BackstoryDef.title: young cadet
BackstoryDef.description: At the youth cadet academy, [PAWN_nameDef] learned how to handle a firearm and make tactical decisions.

BackstoryDef.title: charismatic cadet
BackstoryDef.description: Despite struggling to keep up with the marches and exams, [PAWN_nameDef] somehow managed to stay above the failing line thanks to [PAWN_possessive] natural talent for shooting and leading [PAWN_possessive] fellow cadets.
